document.title: SP517 Evergreen Trees for Screens and Hedges in the Landscape

author.organization: The University of Tennessee Agricultural Extension Service

document.abstract: Screens and hedges are a popular way to create privacy or hide an undesirable view. They can be anything from a section of a fence to individually designed panels, brick walls or a wall of green plant material. Plantings are usually a less expensive way to create privacy than a fence or wall. Screens or hedges also offer additional advantages to many landscapes other than privacy. For example, they can frame a terrace or provide a backdrop to a herbaceous garden or other garden features.
